nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织、中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商的重要机构、中国政治生活中发扬社会主义民主的重要形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, it is an organization of the Chinese people's patriotic united front, an important organ for multi-party cooperation and political consultation led by the Communist Party of China, and an important form of developing socialist democracy in China's political life.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任全国政协主席，中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任全国政协副主席，中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee and a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leadership body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国国民党革命委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized democratic parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争胜利后，中国国民党与中国共产党之间的一次重要谈判。
description.en: An important negotiation between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China after the victory of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1946年由中国国民党、中国共产党、中国民主同盟、中国青年党和无党派人士在重庆举行的政治会议。
description.en: A political conference held in Chongqing in 1946 by the Kuomintang, the Communist Party of China, the China Democratic League, the China Youth Party, and non-partisan individuals.

nodes.id: 政府与中共代表会谈纪要

zh-cn: 政府与中共代表会谈纪要
en: Summary of Conversations between the Government and CCP Representatives

description.zh-cn: 重庆谈判后，国民政府与中共代表达成的协议。
description.en: An agreement reached between the Nationalist Government and CCP representatives after the Chongqing Negotiations.

en: Constitution of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的根本法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 新政治协商会议筹备会

zh-cn: 新政治协商会议筹备会
en: Preparatory Committee for the New Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 为召开中国人民政治协商会议第一届全体会议而成立的筹备机构。
description.en: A preparatory body established to convene the first plenary session of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1957年中国共产党发起的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the Communist Party of China in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国除中国共产党以外的八个参政党的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the eight legally permitted political parties in the People's Republic of China other than the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: A national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

en: China Society for the Theory of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: A national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会和中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会每年同期召开会议的合称。
description.en: The collective name for the annual concurrent meetings of the National People's Congress and the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的常设机构。
description.en: The standing body of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

政治协商会议 (1946年)

description.zh-cn: 重庆谈判中，共产党代表周恩来提出召集党派会议讨论建国方案，最终确定召开政治协商会议。
description.en: During the Chongqing Negotiations, CCP representative Zhou Enlai proposed convening a conference of political parties to discuss the plan for national construction, which led to the decision to hold the Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.source: 政府与中共代表会谈纪要
relationships.target: 政治协商会议 (1946年)

description.zh-cn: 该纪要正式确定了召开政治协商会议的任务。
description.en: This summary formally established the task of convening the Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中华民国宪法

description.zh-cn: 1946年的政治协商会议提出了对《中华民国宪法》草案的若干修正建议。
description.en: The 1946 Political Consultative Conference proposed several amendments to the draft of the Constitution of the Republic of China.

relationships.target: 新政治协商会议筹备会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党召集各党派代表商议建政事宜，成立了新政治协商会议筹备会。
description.en: The Communist Party of China convened representatives from various parties to discuss state-building matters and established the Preparatory Committee for the New Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 新政治协商会议筹备会

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议
relationships.target: 中国国民党

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议排除了中国国民党及其余跟随国民党迁台的卫星政党。
description.en: The Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference excluded the Kuomintang and other satellite parties that followed it to Taiwan.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 1954年全国人民代表大会建立后，中国人民政治协商会议的立法职能让渡予全国人大。
description.en: After the establishment of the National People's Congress in 1954, the legislative function of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference was transferred to the NPC.

relationships.target: 民主党派

description.zh-cn: 反右运动使民主党派此后参政议政受到相当程度的限制。
description.en: The Anti-Rightist Campaign significantly restricted the political participation and deliberation of the democratic parties thereafter.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月30日，全国政协机关因文化大革命停止办公。
description.en: On August 30, 1966, the offices of the CPPCC National Committee ceased operations due to the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 1973年2月28日，经周恩来批准，全国政协举行活动，标志着其开始恢复活动。
description.en: On February 28, 1973, with Zhou Enlai's approval, the CPPCC National Committee held an event, marking the beginning of its resumption of activities.

relationships.target: 毛新宇

description.zh-cn: 据毛新宇称，其全国政协委员身份是时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛亲自批准推荐的。
description.en: According to Mao Xinyu, his membership in the CPPCC National Committee was personally approved and recommended by then-General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Hu Jintao.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国经济社会理事会是政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: The China Economic and Social Council is a national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国宗教界和平委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国宗教界和平委员会是政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: The China Committee on Religion and Peace is a national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政协理论研究会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政协理论研究会是政协全国委员会下辖的全国性社会团体组织。
description.en: The China Society for the Theory of the CPPCC is a national social organization under the CPPCC National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
relationships.target: 两会

description.zh-cn: 全国政协会议与全国人大会议并称为“全国两会”。
description.en: The CPPCC National Committee meeting and the NPC meeting are collectively known as the 'National Two Sessions'.

relationships.target: 两会

description.zh-cn: 全国人大会议与全国政协会议并称为“全国两会”。
description.en: The NPC meeting and the CPPCC National Committee meeting are collectively known as the 'National Two Sessions'.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国政协常委会是全国政协的常设机构，在全国政协会议闭会期间代行其大部分职权。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the CPPCC National Committee is the permanent body of the National Committee and exercises most of its powers when the plenary session is not in session.
